id: FREELANCER OS COMPASS - Project Management Template for Notion
name: FREELANCER OS COMPASS - Project Management Template for Notion
description: What is the FREELANCER COMPASS?Ready to take your freelance game to the next level? Look no further than the Freelancer Compass - your all-in-one solution for task and project management within Notion. With our system, you'll enjoy the benefits of a Pomodoro timer and an Eisenhower matrix, making task prioritization a breeze. Say goodbye to scattered to-do lists and hello to streamlined productivity. Whether you're a solopreneur or a freelancer, the Freelancer Compass will help you stay on track
features: GTD Dashboard,; Daily To-Do-List,; Eisenhower Matrix,; Pomodoro Timer; Kanban Priority Board,; Time Tracking,; Project Progress Bar,; Daily Tasks Overview,; Priority Calculation,; Revenue Stats
